page.title: 02Clubs in Caerhun Parish
page.content: Young men belong to the Rowen Young Farmers' Club which provides many cultural and recreational activities. Some of the residents belong to an excellent Art Club and their work is exhibited annually at the Community Centre of Rowen. There is also a thriving Country Dancing Club. The Women's Institute is an organisation of great interest to the ladies of this area. It meets once a month in the old Baptist Chapel at Rowen and members take an active part in all aspects of life in the community. At the nearby village of Talybont there is an active Young Wives Group and older residents are members of the Darby and Joan Club there.
